mapper.insert: insert into NOTICE(NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_VIEW) VALUES(NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{notice_Writer}, #{notice_Title}, #{notice_Content}, #{notice_View})
insert into FAQ(FAQ_NO, FAQ_WRITER, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_MAINCATEGORI) VALUES(FAQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{faq_Writer}, #{faq_Title}, #{faq_Content}, #{faq_MainCategori})
insert into QNA(QNA_NO, QNA_WRITER, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_MAINCATEGORI, QNA_TOW) VALUES(QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{qna_Writer}, #{qna_Title}, #{qna_Content}, #{qna_MainCategori}, #{qna_Tow})
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from notice where 1 = 1 NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' NOTICE_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%'OR NOTICE_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%'

select count(*) as total from faq where 1 = 1 FAQ_TITLE LIKE '%' ||#{searchName}||'%' FAQ_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' FAQ_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' OR FAQ_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%'

select count(*) as total from qna where 1 = 1 QNA_TITLE LIKE '%' ||#{searchName}||'%' QNA_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' QNA_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' OR QNA_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%'

select a.*, ni_no, ni_path, ni_name from ( select ROWNUM RN, notice_No, notice_Writer, notice_Title, notice_Content, notice_View, case when gap <= 60 THEN '방금전' when gap <= 60 * 24 THEN trunc( gap / 60 ) || '시간전' else to_char(notice_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') end as notice_Regdate from ( select notice_no, notice_writer, notice_title, notice_content, notice_view, notice_regdate, trunc( (sysdate - notice_regdate) * 24 * 60 ) as gap from notice where
1 = 1 NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' NOTICE_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%'OR NOTICE_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%'
order by
notice_no notice_no notice_view
desc ) ) a left outer join notice_image i on a.notice_no = i.notice_no where RN > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}

select a.*, fi_no, fi_path, fi_name from ( select ROWNUM RN, faq_No, faq_Writer, faq_Title, faq_Content, faq_View, case when gap <= 60 THEN '방금전' when gap <= 60 * 24 THEN trunc( gap / 60 ) || '시간전' else to_char(faq_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') end as faq_Regdate from ( select faq_no, faq_writer, faq_title, faq_content, faq_view, faq_maincategori, faq_Regdate, trunc( (sysdate - faq_regdate) * 24 * 60 ) as gap from faq where
faq_maincategori = 'login' faq_maincategori = 'product' faq_maincategori = 'rental' faq_maincategori = 'review' 1 = 1
AND
1 = 1 FAQ_TITLE LIKE '%' ||#{searchName}||'%' FAQ_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' FAQ_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' OR FAQ_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%'
order by
faq_no faq_no faq_view
desc ) ) a left outer join faq_image i on a.faq_no = i.faq_no where RN > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}

select * from ( select ROWNUM RN, a.qna_No, a.qna_Writer, a.qna_Title, a.qna_Content, a.qna_MainCategori, a.qna_Tow, a.qna_View, case when gap <= 60 THEN '방금전' when gap <= 60 * 24 THEN trunc( gap / 60 ) || '시간전' else to_char(qna_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') end as qna_Regdate from ( select qna_No, qna_Writer, qna_Title, qna_Content, qna_MainCategori, qna_Tow, qna_View, qna_Regdate, trunc( ( sysdate - qna_regdate ) * 24 * 60 ) as gap from qna where
qna_maincategori = 'login' qna_maincategori = 'product' qna_maincategori = 'rental' qna_maincategori = 'review' 1 = 1
AND
1 = 1 QNA_TITLE LIKE '%' ||#{searchName}||'%' QNA_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' QNA_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' OR QNA_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%'
order by
qna_no qna_no qna_view
desc ) a ) where RN > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
